title: Red dragonhide armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Red dragonhide armour is a type of Ranged armour. All of the pieces require 60 Ranged to wear, and to wear the body a player must have 40 Defence. All of the pieces can be made through the Crafting skill from 8 pieces of red dragon leather.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Red dragonhide armour

Red dragonhide armour is a type of Ranged armour. All of the pieces require 60 Ranged to wear, and to wear the body a player must have 40 Defence. All of the pieces can be made through the Crafting skill from 8 pieces of red dragon leather.

Components[edit | edit source]

Item GE Price
Red d'hide body 6,009
Red d'hide chaps 2,681
Red d'hide vambraces 1,749
Red d'hide shield 7,387
Total 17,826
